name: Adjustable Button Spinner
description:
Introduction:

This is a responsive button spinner interactive component. Completely reusable and editable.


What will you find in the file:

  • Responsive components (responsive button with spinner).
  •  

How To Use This File:

  • Make an instance from the button component.
  • Update the label.
